
# Override Example (App.tsx)
```
import { Override, Data } from 'framer'

const data = Data({
  playerState: 'stop',
  currentTime: 2,
})

export const MyPlayer: Override = () => {
  return {
    playerState: data.playerState,
    currentTime: data.currentTime,
  }
}

export const StartBtn: Override = () => {
  return {
    onTap() {
      data.playerState = 'play'
    },
  }
}

export const StopBtn: Override = () => {
  return {
    onTap() {
      data.playerState = 'stop'
    },
  }
}

export const PauseBtn: Override = () => {
  return {
    onTap() {
      data.playerState = 'pause'
    },
  }
}

export const PositionBtn: Override = () => {
  return {
    onTap() {
      data.currentTime = 10
    },
  }
}
```
